title: Mobile devices used by U.S. students 2015 , by type and frequency
labels: A few times a month or less
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

On average, the Response Tablet had the highest Share of respondents for all 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. Whereas Smartphone had the lowest average Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

On average, the Response Tablet had the highest Share of respondents for all 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. Whereas Smartphone had the lowest average Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

For Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook, A few times a month or less had the highest Share of respondents among all 4 Responses and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Among all 3 groups, Never had the gap of 67.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and Laptop notebook or Chromebook respectively.

Never had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 3 groups in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer followed by Never in Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for A few times a month or less in Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Averaging all 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more, the Response Tablet is the maximum Share of respondents and Smartphone is the minimum Share of respondents.
